scripts.ios:refresh: bun --cwd .. build:plugin && bun run expo:prebuild-clean-ios && bun run ios:pod-install && bun run ios
scripts.android:refresh: bun --cwd .. build:plugin && bun run expo:prebuild-clean-android && bun run android
scripts.android:reset: rm -rf node_modules bun.lock && bun install && bun run expo:prebuild-clean-android
scripts.android:reset-and-run: bun run android:reset && bun run android
scripts.ios:pod-install-force: rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm Podfile.lock && pod install --repo-update
scripts.ios:reset: rm -rf node_modules bun.lock && bun install && bun run expo:prebuild-clean-ios
scripts.ios:reset-and-run: bun run ios:reset && bun run ios
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules ../node_modules bun.lock ../bun.lock && bun install && bun run expo:prebuild-clean
